body_html:
@tychota Did you get a chance to work on this?

tychota@, To produce a smaller example, I think you can start with a trivial tensorflow program, next maybe try run the inference part only (forward pass) for the model to see if it hits the error; if so try reduce the model as much as possible and only keep the part that leads to the error.

body:
@tychota Did you get a chance to work on this?

> tychota@, To produce a smaller example, I think you can start with a trivial tensorflow program, next maybe try run the inference part only (forward pass) for the model to see if it hits the error; if so try reduce the model as much as possible and only keep the part that leads to the error.
